channel.title: Accurate, aggresive, conrtolled, and defensive messed up
channel.description: Ok well on the Mezzy source for 508 the buttons for the accurate, aggresive, controlled and defensive give the wrong cp, for example when i have accurate selected it gives me str xp, and on my controlled and aggressive i get defense xp and on defensive i get defense xp. what file would this be in to change it??
